description: Bug fix release for HBase-1.1 branch

issues.title: Procedure V2 - Use nonces for double submits from client

Procedure V2 - Administrative Task: provide an API to abort a procedure
Reduce the number of time row comparison is done in a Scan

Upgrade our surefire-plugin from 2.18 to 2.18.1
Procedure V2 - enforce ACL on procedure admin tasks
Procedure V2 - shell command to list all procedures
Procedure V2 - shell command to abort a procedure

Integration test for rpc connection concurrency / deadlock testing
Remove TestVisibilityLabelsWithDistributedLogReplay, a test for an unsupported feature
Slight improvement of StoreScanner.optimize

Minor improvements for usage of the mlock agent

Thrift -  HTTP Error 413 full HEAD if using kerberos authentication

graceful_stop.sh "if [ "$local" ]" condition unexpected behaviour
